answer: Why you might want to invest in both a traditional IRA and a Roth? In a traditional IRA you make pre-tax contributions and pay taxes in retirement when you withdraw the money. The contributions to a Roth IRA are already taxed, so the money grows tax-free, and no taves are paid when it is withdrawn. You must have the Roth account for 5 years.
answerPrivate: Ask customers if they have a Roth and a traditional IRA. Refer them the IRA setup steps.
